about_the_game:
Exoforge's demo is a small glimpse into a coop third person sci-fi shooter that takes a derelict mining crew to one of the many locations in the base game, Exoforge. Players can discover the core gameplay loop and action for Exoforge's Early Access.

Explore, Fight, Collect Resources, Craft, Customize, Drive

content_descriptors.notes: The game is focused on exploring alien worlds in which melee and gun battles depict death and dying with blood. Online multiplayer chat is not censored. Players can wear sexually revealing outfits or be completely nude.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2000 series with at least 6GB VRAM equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2000 series with at least 8GB VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
